hackathon-description-text: To come to this event, register on
hackathon-eligibility: Participants must be at least 18 years of age. You may come as an individual or with a team you've organized ahead of time.
hackathon-rules:
Your project must be new work/development started once the event has begun.
This means you cannot submit your 6 week old startup's MVP for consideration. However, you are allowed to use generic resources you've used for other projects. Have a favorite style sheet, library, pitch deck template, etc? Feel free to use it.
Work may be done on or off site. We encourage you to be at the event while the venue is open, but you are free to work outside of operating hours of the venue. Please remember to sleep :).

Your team must be present at the event to submit and present your work. Teams not present will forfeit any winnings and their prizes will be awarded to another team.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Best job related product (anything that helps job seekers find one another)
Best product solving a HR need (ie. onboarding, termination, stock options, documentations etc.)
What has the greatest chance of success in the market.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1520 2nd St, Santa Monica, CA 90401, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How technically impressive is the product?
Is there a viable business model attached to the idea?
